translation.en: [narrator] Though many know the tragic love story of Antony and Cleopatra,
translation.es: Aunque muchos conocen la trágica historia de Antonio y Cleopatra,

translation.en: the wayward Roman general
who fell madly in love with the enchanting Egyptian queen,
translation.es: que se enamoró perdidamente de la cautivadora reina egipcia,

translation.en: both of them taking their lives
rather than face a world without each other,
translation.es: antes de tener que vivir sin el otro,

translation.en: few know the secret story
of the most sought-after prize and unsolved puzzle of their time.
translation.es: del premio más buscado y el enigma no resuelto de la época.

translation.en: The mystery of Cleopatra's third egg.
translation.es: El misterio del tercer huevo de Cleopatra.

translation.en: On their wedding day, as a symbol of his undying devotion,
translation.es: El día de su boda, como símbolo de eterna devoción,

translation.en: Mark Antony presented Cleopatra with three bejeweled eggs,
translation.es: Marco Antonio le regaló a Cleopatra tres huevos enjoyados,

translation.en: each one more exquisite than the last.
translation.es: uno más bello que el otro.

translation.en: For centuries, these eggs were thought to be nothing more than myth, rumor.
translation.es: Durante siglos, se creyó que los huevos no eran más que un mito o un rumor.

translation.en: But then, in 1907,
just outside of Cairo, a local farmer unearthed two of them.
translation.es: en las afueras de El Cairo, un granjero encontró dos.

translation.en: Some say the third egg was never found.
translation.es: Algunos dicen que el tercero nunca apareció.

translation.en: Others claim it was discovered,
but just as quickly lost, never to be seen again.
translation.es: pero se perdió de nuevo y nadie lo volvió a ver.

translation.en: Join us as we explore that very question.
What happened to Cleopatra's lost egg?
translation.es: ¿qué pasó con el tercer huevo de Cleopatra?

translation.en: Who may hold it in their possession?
And most importantly, will we ever see the day in which
translation.es: Y lo más importante, ¿algún día volvemos a ver

translation.en: all three eggs are reunited for the first time in over 2,000 years?
translation.es: los tres huevos juntos por primera vez en más de 2000 años?

translation.en: Cleopatra's first egg is on display for all to see
translation.es: El primer huevo de Cleopatra está en exhibición

translation.en: at the world-famous Museo Nazionale di Castel Sant'Angelo in Rome.
translation.es: en el célebre Museo Nacional del Castillo Sant'Angelo en Roma.

translation.en: The second egg has been sold at auction numerous times
translation.es: El segundo huevo fue subastado muchas veces

translation.en: and currently is held in a private collection.
translation.es: y actualmente pertenece a una colección privada.

translation.en: You're not a cop.
You're right, I'm not.
You know what I mean, Agent. Your badge is no good here.
translation.es: Sabe a qué me refiero. Su placa aquí no sirve.

translation.en: So no American cowboy stuff.
translation.es: Así que no se haga el vaquero.

translation.en: Don't worry. Left my chaps at home.
You sure about this?
I know how he thinks. He's gonna do it today. Trust me.
translation.es: Sé cómo piensa. Lo hará hoy. Confíe en mí.

translation.en: All right, then, here we go.
-[man in English] Impossible. -I'm not asking.
You need to shut the museum down, evacuate your visitors,
translation.es: Cierre el museo, evacue a los visitantes,

translation.en: and seal all ingress and egress points immediately.
translation.es: selle las entradas y salidas ya.

translation.en: And Interpol has the authority to compel me to do so?
Don't test me, Director.
You should listen to her.
And who are you? Her bodyguard?
This is Special Agent John Hartley of the FBI's Behavioral Analysis Unit.
translation.es: Es el agente John Hartley de Análisis de Comportamiento del FBI.

translation.en: He's a consulting profiler who specializes in art crime.
translation.es: Es un perfilador especializado en delitos de arte.

translation.en: You don't look like a profiler.
Yeah, I get that a lot.
Forty-one hours ago, Agent Hartley received credible intelligence that
translation.es: Hace 41 horas, el agente Hartley recibió información confiable

translation.en: the most wanted art thief in the world, a man named Nolan Booth,
translation.es: de que el ladrón de arte más buscado, Nolan Booth,

translation.en: intends to steal the Egg of Cleopatra today.
translation.es: intentará robar el Huevo de Cleopatra hoy.

translation.en: Who provided you this information?
The Bishop.
You cannot be serious.
My dear, The Bishop is nothing more than a boogeyman story in the art world.
translation.es: El Alfil no es más que un cuco en el mundo del arte.

translation.en: It's a catch-all concept. It's someone to blame
translation.es: Un término comodín para culpar a alguien

translation.en: when you and your friends in law enforcement
are too incompetent to solve the case.
translation.es: es incompetente para resolver un caso.

translation.en: Listen to me, unless we stop it, that egg is gonna be stolen today.
translation.es: Mire, si no lo evitamos, hoy robarán ese huevo.

translation.en: In fact, it may already be gone.
translation.es: De hecho, quizá ya no esté.

translation.en: [in English] Already gone, you say?
Now, if you'll excuse me, Inspector, I believe I owe your supervisor a call.
translation.es: Ahora, discúlpeme, inspectora, debo hablar con su superior.

translation.en: Do you have thermal sensors in this room?
-Of course we do. -Show it to me.
[director] You're wasting our time.
What, may I ask, are you looking for?
Well, you see, Cleopatra's first egg is covered in 18-karat gold.
translation.es: El primer huevo de Cleopatra está bañado en oro 18 quilates.

translation.en: And gold reflects radiation.
translation.es: Y el oro refleja la radiación.

translation.en: That egg should be reflecting the heat in this room.
It should be red, not blue.
It's probably just an error in the thermal sensor.
translation.es: Seguramente es un error en el sensor.

translation.en: Well, there's only one way to find out.
translation.es: Solo hay una forma de saberlo.

translation.en: Hey, sorry, big man, but there's no food or drink in the museum.
translation.es: Lo siento, muchacho, pero nada de comida ni bebida en el museo.

translation.en: Thank you.
No, no, wait a moment. What do you think you're doing?
[woman] Relax, it's fine. He knows what he's doing.
translation.es: Calma, está bien. Él sabe lo que hace.

translation.en: Seal the room. Now!
Move! Move!
He's heading for the exit.
Freeze!
[guard 1 in Italian] He is here. Send reinforcements.
He's on the scaffolding.
We're gonna need more-- [grunts]
I know you. You're the… You're the slow bald guy that's been chasing me.
translation.es: Te conozco. Eres el calvo lento que me persigue.

translation.en: What do you got in the bag?
You're American. What brings you to Rome?
Gelato, the Colosseum.
-Oh, it's beautiful. Beautiful place. -Yeah.
-First time? -Yep.
[Booth] That was a fun foot chase, right? Lots of twists and turns. Hijinks.
translation.es: Fue una persecución divertida. Muchas vicisitudes, travesuras.

translation.en: Who knew it'd end up like this?
-I did. -Right.
translation.es: - ¿Quién diría que acabaría así? - Yo. - Claro. - Se terminó, Booth.

translation.en: Fun's over, Nolan Booth. Give me the bag, turn around,
translation.es: - Claro. - Se terminó, Booth. Dame el bolso, date vuelta, manos atrás. Estás arrestado.

translation.en: put your hands behind your back. You're under arrest.
translation.es: Dame el bolso, date vuelta, manos atrás. Estás arrestado.

translation.en: Okay. Well, hold on one sec. I just have two questions.
Okay. Um…
First question, where'd you get that jacket?
It's a statement piece.
Somewhere there is a very nude cow whispering… [whispers] …"Worth it."
translation.es: En algún lugar, hay una vaca desnuda que susurra: "Valió la pena".

translation.en: And number two, on the whole arresting me thing, I totally get it.
translation.es: Y segundo, en cuanto a arrestarme, lo entiendo.

translation.en: You know, baby did a bad, bad thing. Yeah.
translation.es: El nene hizo algo muy muy malo. Sí.

translation.en: But you don't happen to have, like, a badge or somethin'
translation.es: Pero, por casualidad, no tendrás una placa

translation.en: tucked away in the turtleneck, do you?
I don't need to show you my badge because I've got a gun.
translation.es: No necesito una placa, tengo un arma.

translation.en: Here's the thing. You're putting me in a pickle.
Without identification, how do I know who you are?
For all I know, you could be the bad guy,
and I could be the other bad guy.
translation.es: y yo sería el otro malo.

translation.en: You're right. I am the bad guy.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Yo soy el malo.

translation.en: Now shut up and give me the bag before I shoot you in the mouth.
translation.es: Cállate y dame el bolso, o te callo de un tiro.

translation.en: -I'm gonna give this to you. -[Hartley] Good.
Yeah, I'm just gonna give it to you 'cause I don't even want it.
translation.es: Sí, te lo daré porque ni lo quiero.

translation.en: For the record, none of this feels good.
translation.es: Que conste que esto no me gusta.

translation.en: Booth, don't move!
Come on, let's go.
What the hell?
Where are you going?
Asshole!
[in English] Can you hold on to this for me?
-Thanks. -[sputtering]
-[crowd groaning] -[ice cream truck music playing]
[in Italian] What the hell? You idiot! Are you blind?
[Hartley in English] Nice place you got here.
Special Agent John Hartley, FBI. We met earlier.
translation.es: Agente especial John Hartley, FBI. Ya nos conocemos.

translation.en: Aren't you a little outside your jurisdiction?
I am.
Good thing these guys aren't.
Hi, guys. Don't take your shoes off or anything.
translation.es: Hola, chicos. No se molesten en quitarse los zapatos.

translation.en: You sure you brought enough guns?
What can I say? I like to be thorough.
[Booth] No way, José.
-The intrepid Inspector Das. -[scoffs]
I wouldn't have missed this for the world. I'll take that. Thank you.
translation.es: No me lo habría perdido. Tomaré esto. Gracias.

translation.en: -It's nice to meet a fan. -[Das] Oh, that's cute.
translation.es: - Es lindo conocer a una admiradora. - Tierno.

translation.en: You wanna know what else is cute?
Because you're wanted in 18 separate countries,
I get to choose which one of them detains you until trial,
translation.es: yo elijo cuál te detendrá hasta el juicio,

translation.en: given your escape history.
What are you, six for six now?
Yeah. One more and I get a Shawshank jacket.
translation.es: Sí. Una más y me dan un premio.

translation.en: Keep making your jokes because I'm about to send you to the worst place in the world.
translation.es: Sigue bromeando porque te enviaré al peor lugar del mundo.

translation.en: Your Instagram account?
You know, I'm really starting to not like you.
Oh, come on!
Not like me? You don't even know me.
We could have a lot in common.
[scoffs] Maybe I don't know you, but I've been building a profile on you,
translation.es: Quizá no te conozca, pero trabajo en tu perfil

translation.en: ever since you stole William Strang's Lady with a Red Hat from the Tate
translation.es: desde que robaste Dama con sombrero rojo de Strang

translation.en: back in 2014.
You can't prove that was me.
translation.es: No pueden probar que fui yo.

translation.en: I got that on Etsy.
I've been tracking your scores for a while.
So let me take a crack at who I think you really are.
translation.es: Déjame demostrar quién creo que eres.

translation.en: Sure thing. Yeah.
-Only child. -Mmm-hmm.
[Hartley] Dad's a Swiss cop, Mom's an American professor.
translation.es: Padre, policía suizo, madre, profesora estadounidense.

translation.en: You started stealing between the ages of six and eight.
translation.es: Empezaste a robar entre los seis y ocho años.

translation.en: You found out you had a real talent for it.
It made you feel special, different.
You like to work alone. You don't like a team.
translation.es: Te gusta trabajar solo, nada de equipos.

translation.en: The only jobs you take are the ones that make the big, splashy headlines,
translation.es: Haces los trabajos que generan grandes titulares,

translation.en: which tells me that you only do it for the thrill and not the money.
translation.es: eso me dice que lo haces por la emoción, no por el dinero.

translation.en: Are you insane? I love the money.
I'm not done yet. I'm just getting to the good part.
translation.es: Aún no terminé. Ahora viene la parte interesante.

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
A lot of thieves out there who claim to only do it for the money.
translation.es: Muchos ladrones declaran hacerlo solo por dinero.

translation.en: That's not unusual.
But what is unusual is the risk that you take.
translation.es: Pero lo inusual son los riesgos que corres.

translation.en: The chances.
It's as though you wanna get caught so you can escape,
translation.es: Es como si quisieras que te atraparan para poder escapar,

translation.en: just to prove yourself all over again,
translation.es: y así probarte una vez más,

translation.en: and prove that you're better than everybody else
translation.es: y demostrar que eres el mejor de todos,

translation.en: and that you're worthy.
Worthy of what? This speech?
Your father's love.
Congratulations.
How'd you find me?
Well, the same way I knew that you were gonna steal the egg in Rome.
translation.es: Del mismo modo que supe que robarías el huevo en Roma.

translation.en: [whispers] The Bishop.
[whispers] The Bishop.
[normally] Get him ready to move.
Booth, I'm curious.
How does it feel to be sold out by the most wanted art thief in the world?
translation.es: ¿Qué se siente ser entregado por el ladrón más buscado?

translation.en: I'm the most wanted art thief in the world.
translation.es: Yo soy el ladrón de arte más buscado.

translation.en: You were.
[Das] Wait. Wait here.
There's no chance I'm putting that thing in the same van as him.
translation.es: No pondré eso en la camioneta con él.

translation.en: -See you at the airfield. -I'll see you there.
translation.es: - Nos vemos en el aeródromo. - Nos vemos.

translation.en: [in English] Door open.
All right. We're good.
Thank you.
Hi, there.
-You leaving town? -[Hartley] Flight's in an hour.
translation.es: - ¿Se va? - El vuelo sale en una hora.

translation.en: Something up?
You could say that. Hmm.
Okay. What's going on?
[chuckles] Funny, I was gonna ask you the same thing.
What are you doing with that?
Oh, this priceless piece of ancient cultural whatnot?
Booth gave us a fake egg.
translation.es: Booth nos dio un huevo falso.

translation.en: I'll admit, Booth was my first thought too.
translation.es: Lo admito, también culpé a Booth primero.

translation.en: Then I asked myself, "How well do you really know someone
you only met 72 hours ago?"
And someone whose official credentials
came solely by a written interagency communiqué.
translation.es: llegaron por un escrito entre agencias.

translation.en: So I called up the Assistant Director of the BAU at Quantico, really nice lady.
translation.es: Así que llamé a la subdirectora de UAC en Quantico, una dama muy agradable.

translation.en: She'd never heard of you.
-That's impossible. -[Das] Is it?
Yes, it's impossible.
As impossible as a John Hartley with a Swiss bank account that received an $8 million wire transfer
translation.es: ¿Y que John Hartley tenga una cuenta en Suiza que recibió ocho millones

translation.en: from an encrypted third-party on the same day the egg was stolen?
translation.es: de un desconocido el mismo día del robo del huevo?

translation.en: Quite a coincidence, wouldn't you say, Agent?
[officer 2 over radio] We have eyes on target.
Listen, whatever you think this is, whatever you think I did, I didn't do.
translation.es: No importa lo que crea que hice, no fui yo.

translation.en: Someone's behind this. The Bishop, maybe even Booth himself.
translation.es: Alguien está detrás de esto. El Alfil o Booth.

translation.en: -I'm being set up. -Maybe you are, maybe you're not.
Until I figure it out, I'm gonna keep you where I can find you.
Now, normally, I'm not a vindictive person, but,
well, I trusted you and you hurt my feelings.
translation.es: pero confié en usted y me hirió.

translation.en: So I picked someplace extra special.
translation.es: Así que elegí un lugar especial.

translation.en: It's a bit of a black site. Kind of the land due process forgot.
translation.es: Clandestino. Donde el debido proceso no existe.

translation.en: You're under arrest, Agent Hartley.
Das, look at me. Look at my eyes.
I didn't do this.
I don't believe you.
You a top or a bottom? [grunts]
Doesn't matter. Prison's gonna decide for us.
translation.es: No importa. Lo decidirán por nosotros.

translation.en: You gotta be shittin' me.
[Booth] Well, I'll say one thing about ol' Inspector Das,
translation.es: Hay que admitirlo, la inspectora Das

translation.en: she's got a real sense of humor.
Put 'er there, roomie.
You're right, we should wash up first.
It's okay. You're safe here.
Except if they find out you're a cop. Then they're gonna wanna kill you.
translation.es: Pero si se enteran de que eres policía, querrán matarte.

translation.en: [Booth] Bishop must have seen you coming from a mile away.
translation.es: El Alfil debe haberte visto llegar de lejos.

translation.en: Got your trust after selling me out.
translation.es: Se ganó tu confianza antes de entregarme.

translation.en: Can't run a con without gaining the mark's trust first, that's page one.
translation.es: No hay engaño sin la confianza de tu víctima. Es básico.

translation.en: I know how a confidence scheme works, trust me.
[Booth] Well, you do now, that's for sure.
The same mystery thief who ratted me out is the same one who framed you.
translation.es: El ladrón misterioso que me delató es quien te incriminó.

translation.en: That seems like a coincidence, don't you think?
This is not a coincidence. This is a plan.
translation.es: No es una coincidencia. Es un plan.

translation.en: In one move, The Bishop took out her lead competitor and lead investigator.
translation.es: De una, el Alfil se libró de su mayor competidor y del investigador.

translation.en: -Two birds, one stone. -Egg.
translation.es: - Dos pájaros de un tiro. - Huevo.

translation.en: -What? -Two birds, one egg.
It's kind of a lay-up. Even Post Malone gets it.
translation.es: Es un chiste obvio. Hasta Post Malone lo entiende.

translation.en: This is farm-to-table, right? Thank you.
I don't understand why.
Why would The Bishop go to the trouble of framing me when she already has the egg?
translation.es: ¿Por qué el Alfil me incriminaría si ya tenía el huevo?

translation.en: I mean, what's left?
Three hundred million dollars?
You're kidding. I never heard of a price tag like that.
translation.es: Es broma. Nunca oí un precio así.

translation.en: No one has.
But you don't understand, that's not the price for just one egg.
translation.es: Pero no entiendes, no es el precio por un huevo.

translation.en: Here's the deal.
Whoever brings this Egyptian billionaire all three eggs
translation.es: Quien le lleve los tres huevos al multimillonario egipcio

translation.en: by the night of his daughter's wedding gets all the marbles.
translation.es: la noche de la boda de su hija gana el gran premio.

translation.en: Turns out, Mr. Big Daddy Big Bucks' daughter,
translation.es: Adivina cómo se llama la hija

translation.en: guess what her name is?
Stop guessing, it's Cleopatra.
I mean, these people are horrible. But I like money, so…
translation.es: Esta gente es malísima. Pero me gusta el dinero, así que…

translation.en: So how does that work?
No one knows where the third egg is. It's never been found.
translation.es: No se sabe dónde está el tercero. Nunca lo hallaron.

translation.en: I'm not gonna lie, that's a bit of a problem.
translation.es: No te mentiré, es un problema.

translation.en: I was gonna deal with the second egg first.
Then the rest.
[sighs] All right, well, Bureau intel says that the second egg
translation.es: Pero según información del FBI, al segundo lo tiene un traficante de armas.

translation.en: is owned by an international arms dealer.
translation.es: al segundo lo tiene un traficante de armas.

translation.en: Sotto Voce. I know all about this guy.
translation.es: Sotto Voce. Sé todo del tipo.

translation.en: His dad tried to strangle him when he was 14.
translation.es: Su padre casi lo estrangula a los 14.

translation.en: Nobody can stand this son of a bitch. [chuckles]
translation.es: Nadie soporta al hijo de puta.

translation.en: Apparently, it left quite the impression on him.
And strangling folks became sort of a hobby for him.
translation.es: Y estrangular a gente se volvió un pasatiempo para él.

translation.en: He's a big fan.
[Booth] Sotto Voce is super scary.
But he's not above having a good time.
Throws a masquerade party every year for his top buyers
translation.es: Hace una fiesta de disfraces anual para sus clientes

translation.en: in his I-probably-have-a-tiny-penis villa in Valencia.
translation.es: en una mansión estilo "tengo pito chico" en Valencia.

translation.en: Gunrunners are a little touchy about their identity.
So the Eyes Wide Shut thing takes the edge off for everyone.
translation.es: Así que los disfraces les vienen como anillo al dedo.

translation.en: Now, what none of these evil one-percenters know
translation.es: Pero hay algo que esos ricos no saben.

translation.en: is that upstairs, locked away in a secret vault,
Dr. Shirtless has in his possession
an ancient piece of pricelessness that I like to call…
translation.es: una antigua pieza invaluable a la que me gusta llamar

translation.en: Cleopatra's second egg.
And it's just begging for me to steal it.
translation.es: Me está suplicando que lo robe.

translation.en: I'd be on my way there right now if you weren't such a super cop.
translation.es: Estaría en camino, si no fueras tan buen policía.

translation.en: -Don't do that. -[whispers] What? -Don't do that. -[whispers] Do what?
-I know what you're doing. Listen. -[whispers] I'm not doing anything.
translation.es: - Sé lo que haces. Oye. - No estoy haciendo nada.

translation.en: [whispering] These guys here, if they find out you're a C-O-P…
translation.es: Si estos tipos se enteran de que eres P-O-L-I-C-Í-A…

translation.en: This is a room full of convicted murderers and toilet vodka enthusiasts.
translation.es: Una sala llena de asesinos y fanáticos del vodka barato.

translation.en: We gotta make sure they know you're not a cop.
translation.es: No pueden saber que eres policía.

translation.en: -[yelling] Nyet politsiya. -[in English] Listen to me. I beg…
Guys? Nyet politsiya. Not a cop.
This man is not a cop, all right?
translation.es: Este hombre no es policía. ¿Está claro?

translation.en: Get that through your thick skulls right now!
He's a profiler for the FBI,
which does fall under the umbrella of law enforcement, but not a cop.
translation.es: que está dentro de las fuerzas de seguridad, pero no es policía.

translation.en: It's similar, but it's not the same thing. It's a complicated backstory.
translation.es: Es parecido, pero no es lo mismo. Es difícil de explicar.

translation.en: This is our good friend, Special Agent John Hartley.
translation.es: Nuestro buen amigo, el agente especial John Hartley.

translation.en: Let's give him a warm welcome to the prison, guys.
Thank you, guys. [whispering] I don't think anyone heard me. We're good.
translation.es: Gracias, amigos. No me oyeron. Todo bien.

translation.en: All's quiet on the western front.
-Nobody's… Oh, no. -[objects clattering]
[Booth] Yep. Drago Grande heard. Here he comes.
translation.es: Sí. Drago Grande oyó. Aquí viene.

translation.en: [whispering] Okay, be cool. Don't embarrass me.
translation.es: Calma. No me hagas pasar vergüenza.

translation.en: [normally] Hello, sir.
You die.
[whispering] Okay, he knows.
He knows you're a cop.
The jig is up.
[whispering] It's okay.
You can have mine. You need some nourishment.
translation.es: Te doy el mío. Necesitas alimentarte.

translation.en: [whispering] You should get up. You look like a little bitch right now.
I say that as a friend.
Okay, look.
I don't wanna do the whole prison fight thing with you…
translation.es: No quiero hacer la pelea de la cárcel…

translation.en: -[soft] You got this. I'm in your corner. -So please, no fight.
translation.es: Tú puedes. Yo te apoyo. Así que, por favor, no peleemos.

translation.en: Let's just go back and finish our meals.
-No. No-- -[guard in Russian] Back to your cell!
[Booth in English] God…
All that working out.
You still get your ass spanked by a toothless man with tuberculosis--
translation.es: Y un desdentado con tuberculosis te da una paliza.

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
If you ever pull shit like that again, it'll be the last thing you do.
translation.es: Si vuelves a hacer algo así, será lo último que hagas.

translation.en: Right.
-You don't know me, Booth. -No.
You have no idea what I'm capable of.
translation.es: No sabes de qué soy capaz.

translation.en: Okay. Thank God, you're here.
translation.es: Gracias a Dios que están aquí.

translation.en: [in Russian] The captain wants to see you. Let's go!
[in English] Him?
Oh, no, us. Okay.
Hello, boys.
Oh, my God.
You're the captain?
You might benefit from a little career change. [chuckles]
translation.es: Un cambio de carrera podría venirte bien.

translation.en: I mean, I'm… I don't think runway,
but definitely regional catalog work, fliers…
She's The Bishop.

translation.es: y se dice que su búnker misterioso contiene todo el tesoro robado.

translation.en: How can you be sure the third egg itself is actually there?
translation.es: ¿Cómo estás seguro de que el tercer huevo está ahí?

translation.en: Faith.
Faith?
I'm sorry, I just wanna be clear.
So we're out in the middle of nowhere based on faith?
translation.es: ¿Estamos en medio de la nada por una cuestión de fe?

translation.en: Or "gut vibe" if you're not into the whole religious thing.
translation.es: O corazonada si no eres religioso.

translation.en: You know, the kinda thing I'm into is a good plan.
translation.es: Yo prefiero tener un buen plan.

translation.en: A smart plan, the opposite of this.
translation.es: Un plan astuto, lo opuesto a esto.

translation.en: Relax. I have good news. If I'm reading this map right…
translation.es: Cálmate. Tengo buenas noticias. Si lo estoy mirando bien,

translation.en: We're here.
-We're where? -We've arrived.
X marks the spot.
X… What spot? X marks the spot.
translation.es: La X… ¿Qué lugar? La X marca el lugar.

translation.en: We're here. Here it is. Great job!
-Please don't yell at me. -You found it! Booth found it.
There's no bunker. There's shit here.
translation.es: No hay búnker. No hay nada.

translation.en: -I'm just telling you what the map says. -There's no bunker.
translation.es: - Eso dice el mapa. - No hay búnker.

translation.en: Tell me, what does the map say?
Oh, shit!
Yeah, it's gonna be a long walk back.
You know what I blame? I blame the compass.
I got this thing back in Scouts. It's been a little wonky.
translation.es: Me la dieron en los Scouts. No anda bien.

translation.en: It was never my strong suit.
-Can I see this? -Absolutely.
-Can I see this? -Of course.
I see what the problem is.
-That's the problem. -Oh. That is not kind.
translation.es: - Ese es el problema. - Qué grosero.

translation.en: You know what's not kind? Dragging me out in the middle of nowhere,
translation.es: ¡Grosero es arrastrarme al medio de la nada,

translation.en: halfway around the world, based on a goddamn hunch!
translation.es: del otro lado del mundo, por una corazonada!

translation.en: [Booth] Holy shit!
Guess they're paying the utilities.
It's gotta be hydroelectric power,
which means there's running water somewhere down here.
translation.es: debe haber una corriente de agua cerca.

translation.en: Look at that door. Nothing hiding behind there.
translation.es: Mira esa puerta. No hay nada escondido detrás.

translation.en: How are we gonna get through this?
Oh, shit!
You have got to be kidding.
Is that your father's watch?
No. It's the watch from Pulp Fiction.
translation.es: No, es el reloj de Tiempos violentos.

translation.en: Yes, it's my father's watch.
translation.es: Sí, es el reloj de mi padre.

translation.en: -I thought you said you smashed it. -I had it repaired. Is that a problem?
translation.es: Pero lo habías roto. Lo hice arreglar. ¿Algún problema?

translation.en: No, it's not a problem. Glad you're not touchy about it.
translation.es: Ningún problema. Me alegra que no te afecte.

translation.en: Please shut up.
Uh, fun with magnets. All right.
Dad…
Please be good crazy.
translation.es: por favor, sé un loco bueno.

translation.en: Forget the egg, let's just steal this stuff.
[Hartley] We're not here to steal anything.
Uh, actually we are. We're here to steal the egg.
translation.es: En realidad, sí. Vinimos a robar el huevo.

translation.en: [Hartley] You know what I mean.
[Booth] Oh, I steal it, it's stealing, and you steal it, it's what?
translation.es: Si lo robo yo es robar, si lo robas tú, ¿qué es?

translation.en: How about we just shut up? And by we, I mean you.
translation.es: ¿Y si nos callamos? Me refiero a ti.

translation.en: [Booth] You're also rude too.
Rude to boot.
[Hartley] How are we gonna find this egg?
[Booth] I don't know.
Look for a box that says "MacGuffin."
translation.es: Busca una caja que diga "Lo que buscan".

translation.en: Do you know what this is?
This is…
Yes, this is a 1931 Mercedes-Benz Grosser 770.
translation.es: Sí, es un Mercedes-Benz Grosser 770 de 1931.

translation.en: I could flip this for $25 million, easy.
There's, like, three of these left on the planet. Four!
There's four now.
Three quarter-inch steel,
reinforced armor-plating, bullet-resistant glass,
and a 24-karat gold inlay.
This is a convertible tank.
And it's in mint condition. I bet you this thing still runs.
translation.es: Y está en perfectas condiciones. Seguro funciona.

translation.en: Too bad it was driven by Nazi scum.
translation.es: Qué mal que lo usaron los nazis.

translation.en: It's a shame we're gonna have to burn it.
How did they get it down here anyway?
They carry it down the stairs in tiny pieces and reassemble?
translation.es: ¿Los bajaron en partes por la escalera y lo rearmaron?

translation.en: Through there.
Place must have been built off one of those old copper mines.
translation.es: Debe haber sido una antigua mina de cobre.

translation.en: The shafts down here are massive and go on for miles.
translation.es: Los corredores son enormes y kilométricos.

translation.en: Build the bunker, bring in the loot, seal the shaft…
translation.es: Construyen el búnker, traen el botín, sellan el corredor…

translation.en: Bob's your uncle.
Who's your daddy? [Hartley] That's not how it goes.
translation.es: - ¿Quién tiene la sartén por el mango? - No es así.

translation.en: [Booth] I know.
Well, labels, Nazis, dum-dums.
Five-second rule.
It's fine. Totally fine. Not a scratch on it.
translation.es: Está bien. Perfecto. Ni una raya.

translation.en: Are you sure you don't wanna flip this one? I got a guy.
translation.es: ¿Seguro no quieres venderlo? Conozco a un tipo.

translation.en: Let me save you the trouble.
Your entrances are bullshit.
Egypt? [scoffs]
Did you really think I ran right off to the pyramids on your good word?
translation.es: ¿Creíste que iría a las pirámides confiando en tu palabra?

translation.en: All I had to do was wait for you two to escape from Sotto Voce,
translation.es: Solo tenía que esperar que escaparan de Sotto Voce,

translation.en: and you led me right to the third egg,
translation.es: y que me guiaran al tercer huevo,

translation.en: which I'm going to take from you now.
So, uh, hand it over.
Come on, don't be shy.
[mockingly] Good job. Attaboy.
Drop your weapon!
[in English] How did she find us?
I followed you. She must have followed me.
translation.es: Yo te seguí. Ella debe haberme seguido a mí.

translation.en: No shit!
Why are you shooting at them? I thought you were on their side.
translation.es: ¿Por qué les disparas? Eras de los suyos.

translation.en: I am on their side. They shot at me first.
How are we gonna get out of here?
We take that.
I don't think that's gonna make it up the stairs.
translation.es: No creo que pueda subir escaleras.

translation.en: -[cocks gun] -It ain't going up the stairs.
Cover us.
-Go, go, go! -I'm trying!
Let's go.
Let's go!
-Throw it. -What?
Now!
[in English] I'm all out.
[in English] Bishop, the egg!
[Booth] You saved me.
You love me. You love me like crazy.
translation.es: Me amas. Me amas con locura.

translation.en: -Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! -Shit!
We're running out of road.
Hold on to something! If we stop, they'll catch us.
Then let's get caught.
We can escape later. It works for me all the time.
translation.es: Podemos escapar después. Siempre me funciona.

translation.en: Make sure to kick clear of the car.
-I would like to workshop this idea. -Oh, shit!
It's just like we drew it up, right?
Hartley?
Hartley?
Hartley?
You will be missed.
Oh, shit! God damn it.
Hartley?
Hartley? Hartley?
Hey, where are you, you big idiot?
[Hartley] Who are you calling an idiot?
I'm right here.
-Did you just choose me over the egg? -No.
translation.es: - ¿Me elegiste por sobre el huevo? - No.

translation.en: -Well, it kinda looks like you did. -I didn't.
translation.es: - Parece que sí. - No es cierto.

translation.en: You went running in there to rescue me.
I left my phone in there.
You only have a finite amount of time to save it.
Stick it in a bag of rice, it's a whole thing.
translation.es: Ponerlo en una bolsa con arroz, un lío.

translation.en: You thought I was dead.
I didn't think you were dead. I wished you were dead.
translation.es: No creí que habías muerto. Lo deseé.

translation.en: I saw you splashing around. "Hartley! Hartley!"
Yes, okay, I wanted to pull you out,
save you, get your hopes up, and then pull you, shove you under.
translation.es: salvarte, darte esperanzas y luego, regresarte y hundirte.

translation.en: Look, I'm not gonna make a big deal out of this.
translation.es: No voy a darle mucha importancia.

translation.en: I'm not gonna gloat. It's not who I am.
translation.es: No voy a alardear. No soy así.

translation.en: Would some people say that this is very embarrassing for you?
translation.es: ¿Dirían que esto es vergonzoso para ti?

translation.en: Yes, of course. Of course they would.
translation.es: Sí, claro. Por supuesto que sí.

translation.en: Probably everybody.
But that's not important right now.
What's important is that you realize you lost and I won.
translation.es: Lo que importa es que veas que tú perdiste, y yo gané.

translation.en: We.
We won. Together. Friendship. Teamwork.
translation.es: Ganamos. Juntos. Amistad. Trabajo en equipo.

translation.en: It's called the moral of the story.
And something that I've been wanting to say for years
translation.es: Y algo que hace años que quiero decirte

translation.en: to your face is…
Checkmate.
Oh, that feels good.
I've got two eggs, you've got one, and you think you won?
translation.es: Tengo dos huevos, tú, uno, y ¿crees que ganaste?

translation.en: How's that work exactly?
I don't have to win in order for you to lose.
translation.es: No tengo que ganar para que pierdas.

translation.en: That's the best part of this whole thing.
translation.es: Es lo mejor de todo esto.

translation.en: As long as I have the third egg, you can't win.
translation.es: Mientras yo tenga el tercer huevo, no ganas.

translation.en: I don't care about the money anymore.
translation.es: Ya no me importa el dinero.

translation.en: Honestly, look at your face right now.
That face right there. Just… Yeah. Perfect.
Resting failure face. I mean, in a word, priceless.
translation.es: La cara de fracaso perpetuo. En una palabra, invaluable.

translation.en: Also, it just gets better.
As an added bonus, my friend here, at no extra charge,
translation.es: Y como bono extra, mi amigo, sin costo adicional,

translation.en: is gonna give you a lifetime supply of prison.
translation.es: te dará una dosis eterna de prisión.

translation.en: So… [in accent] That's-a nice.
-Stand up. -Stand up.
Told you how this was gonna end.
You're right. I am the bad guy.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Yo soy el malo.

translation.en: I know how a confidence scheme works, trust me.
translation.es: No hay engaño sin la confianza de tu víctima. Es básico.

translation.en: You don't know me, Booth.
You have no idea what I'm capable of.
translation.es: No sabes de qué soy capaz.

translation.en: What the fuck?
Look at him.
Resting failure face. Priceless.
This whole time you were working for her? Not for, with.
translation.es: - ¿Todo este tiempo trabajaste para ella? - Para no, con.

translation.en: -Like partners. -Yeah, we're both The Bishop.
translation.es: - Como socios. - Sí, ambos somos el Alfil.

translation.en: Has he told you where the third egg is yet?
translation.es: ¿Ya le dijo dónde está el tercer huevo?

translation.en: -I love you. -I love you too.
translation.es: - Te amo. - Yo también te amo.

translation.en: -Ready? [grunts] -Yep.
Surprise!
There are two bishops in chess.
-And a whole lotta pawns. -Hmm.
[Hartley] I passed the first egg on to her in Bali.
translation.es: Le pasé el primer huevo en Bali.

translation.en: She took the second egg from Sotto Voce.
translation.es: Le robó el segundo a Sotto Voce.

translation.en: And the third egg, well, the only way for us to get our hands on it
translation.es: Y el tercero, la única manera de conseguirlo

translation.en: was if you led us right to it, which you did.
translation.es: era que tú nos guiaras a él, cosa que hiciste.

translation.en: I thought for sure you were gonna see through my "We're not partners, I gotta clear my name,
translation.es: Pensé que me descubrirías con lo de "No somos socios, debo limpiar mi nombre.

translation.en: I'm Johnny Law, blah, blah, blah."
translation.es: Soy el Sr. Honestidad, bla, bla, bla".

translation.en: To be honest, I thought I laid it on too thick in the prison.
translation.es: Pensé que en prisión había exagerado.

translation.en: -No, honey, you were so good. -No? Really?
Appreciate that. What'd you think? You think it was too much?
I have notes. Otherwise, pretty good.
translation.es: Tengo comentarios. Pero estuviste bastante bien.

translation.en: "Pretty good"? All right.
Let's just rewind for one second here.
You electrocuted him. You went "Downtown."
Yes. By the way, that hurt like hell.
I know. I'm so sorry. I had to.
translation.es: Lo sé. Lo siento. Tuve que hacerlo.

translation.en: [The Bishop] It was the only way I could pass you a key to slip the cuffs.
translation.es: Solo así podía pasarle la llave de las esposas.

translation.en: [sputtering] How did you get free?
Well, anyhoo, the egg.
The egg.
That gun is soaking wet. There's no way--
I'm not a Navy SEAL.
Third egg.
-Thank you. -Let's take a walk.
So it was all a lie? Even the sob story about your dad?
translation.es: ¿Fue todo mentira? ¿Hasta la triste historia sobre tu padre?

translation.en: No. My dad was a con man, and I hated him.
translation.es: No. Mi padre fue un estafador, y lo odiaba.

translation.en: So I decided to become better than he ever was. Beat him at his own game.
translation.es: Decidí superarlo. Vencerlo en su propio juego.

translation.en: Booth, don't be too hard on yourself.
translation.es: Booth, no seas muy duro contigo.

translation.en: You're good, really good, better than most.
translation.es: Eres muy bueno, mejor que la mayoría.

translation.en: We got nothing but respect for you.
Better luck next time.
[The Bishop] We'd love to stay and chat, but we have an important wedding to attend
translation.es: Nos encantaría charlar, pero debemos asistir a una boda importante

translation.en: and it turns out, we have the perfect gift.
translation.es: y resulta que tenemos el regalo perfecto.

translation.en: [Hartley] No hard feelings, pal.
It's what we do.
[clicks tongue] None taken. Super fun time, guys.
translation.es: No tengo rencor. Fue muy divertido.

translation.en: See, I always appreciate a quality double-cross.
Serious question though, you guys have any sunblock?
I have no base. This is a spray tan.
translation.es: No tengo base. Mi bronceado es artificial.

translation.en: [man] A beautiful event like tonight happens only once in a father's life.
translation.es: Un hermoso evento como esta velada a un padre solo le sucede una vez.

translation.en: That is why when I arranged for my only daughter to marry,
translation.es: Y por eso, cuando organicé la boda de mi única hija,

translation.en: I spared no expense to acquire a gift unlike any other.
translation.es: decidí gastar lo que fuera en un regalo inigualable.

translation.en: A gift fit for a queen,
translation.es: Un regalo digno de una reina,

translation.en: my Cleopatra.
Behold, for the first time in two millennia,
translation.es: Contemplen, por primera vez en dos milenios,

translation.en: all three treasured eggs have been reunited.
translation.es: los tres valiosos huevos juntos otra vez.

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, my God! Ed…
[Cleopatra] Ed Sheeran!
I love you!
Ed Sheeran, who knew?
God, he's so cute.
Yeah, I like that guy.
[male officer] Attention. This is an Interpol police action.
translation.es: Atención. Este es un procedimiento de Interpol.

translation.en: Remain in your seats. This will be over shortly.
translation.es: Permanezcan en sus asientos. Será breve.

translation.en: What are you doing?
-Cheers. -Cheers.
-Oh, my God. Don't touch me. Excuse me! -Oi!
Come on, then. Come on! Come on!
We'll take those. Thank you very much.
-Let's get out of here. -[chuckles softly]
Possession of stolen Nazi loot is a crime.
translation.es: Poseer arte robado por nazis es un delito.

translation.en: You're under arrest, father of the bride.
translation.es: Está arrestado, padre de la novia.

translation.en: This is outrageous.
[both grunting] Get off me. Do you know who I am?
I was in Game of Thrones!
I'm Ed Sheeran, bitch!
[Booth] This gouda is disappointing.
Such a fancy yacht, you'd think they could stock some decent cheeses.
translation.es: En semejante yate, uno cree que habrá buen queso.

translation.en: That's not cheese. That's uncooked pork.
translation.es: No es queso. Es cerdo crudo.

translation.en: I've heard tapeworms can be quite slimming.
translation.es: Oí que las tenias te hacen adelgazar.

translation.en: Surprised to see me?
Well, we're just surprised it took you so long to find us.
translation.es: Solo de que tardaras tanto en encontrarnos.

translation.en: Oh, I actually… I came aboard yesterday.
translation.es: En realidad, estoy aquí desde ayer.

translation.en: You weren't the only one crying at the end of your lovemaking.
translation.es: No fuiste el único que lloró tras hacer el amor.

translation.en: You know, funny story, after Das picked me up on the beach…
translation.es: Es curioso, después de que Das me rescatara en la playa…

translation.en: Looks like you ran out of friends.
[Booth] She sent me to the only place on Earth that actually is worse
translation.es: Me envió al único lugar que es peor que su cuenta de Instagram.

translation.en: than her Instagram account.
translation.es: que es peor que su cuenta de Instagram.

translation.en: But then I remembered
that I'm pretty good at escaping from things.
So I did.
Look, am I upset about what happened back on the beach?
translation.es: ¿Estoy molesto por lo que pasó en la playa?

translation.en: Absolutely not. All's fair in love and eggs.
translation.es: Para nada. Todo vale en el amor y los huevos.

translation.en: I came to congratulate you both.
Great. Glad you approve. What do you want?
Well, I'm big on forgiveness. I always have been.
translation.es: Soy muy bueno perdonando. Siempre lo fui.

translation.en: But I'm not so big on forget-ness.
What are you talking about?
I'm talking about my twist ending.
You know the 300 million you guys got on the eggs
translation.es: ¿Los 300 millones que cobraron por los huevos

translation.en: before you double-crossed the billionaire? Nice touch, by the way.
translation.es: antes de traicionar al multimillonario? Lindo detalle, por cierto.

translation.en: Anyhow, I gave our friend, Inspector Das, a little jingle
translation.es: Llamé a nuestra amiga, la inspectora,

translation.en: and I tipped her off about that secure Cayman Island account you stashed it in.
translation.es: y le conté de la cuenta en la isla Caimán donde los tenían.

translation.en: Turns out, it's not as secure as one might hope.
translation.es: La cuenta no es tan segura como uno quisiera.

translation.en: Take it all.
[Booth] See? Now, we're even.
Everyone loses, no one gets the money and we can all be friends again.
translation.es: Todos pierden, nadie recibe dinero y volvemos a ser amigos.

translation.en: Cut the shit. What's the offer?
There's a new score.
Double the payout, triple the challenge, plus, here's the best part.
translation.es: El doble de dinero, el tripe de dificultad y lo mejor

translation.en: It's a three-thief job. [mouthing] One, two, three.
translation.es: es que es un trabajo para tres.

translation.en: And let me guess, if we don't say yes,
then Inspector Das is on her way right now to arrest us.
translation.es: la inspectora Das vendrá a arrestarnos.

translation.en: Yes, in very fast boats.
Know what I think is funny, Booth?
Vin Diesel's audition tape for Cats? It exists.
translation.es: ¿La audición de Vin Diesel para Cats? Existe.

translation.en: The fact that you think the two of us would ever team up with you.
translation.es: Que creyeras que volveríamos a trabajar contigo.

translation.en: Get off the boat.
Great. I'll, uh, send you both a sharpened toothbrush.
translation.es: Genial. Les enviaré cepillos de dientes afilados.

translation.en: Wait, stop.
[sighs] Look, we need a new score now anyway.
translation.es: De todos modos, necesitamos dar un golpe.

translation.en: I know he drives you crazy, but he's good.
translation.es: Sé que te vuelve loco, pero es bueno.

translation.en: -And you two work well together. -No, we don't.
translation.es: - Trabajan bien juntos. - No es cierto.

translation.en: We kinda do.
Do you trust me?
Always.
-You love me? -Big time.
That's all we need.
[both] What are we stealing?
This.
[in Italian] It's abandoned. They're not here.
Ready?
What could possibly go wrong?
Everything.
[The Bishop] Don't miss me too much.
[sing-song] Ta-ta!
